description: These slow cooked stuffed capsicums are tender and bursting with a hearty Moroccan flavoured filling.
keywords: Stuffed capsicum,Low saturated fat,High protein,Seafood free,Soy free,Egg free,Slow cooker,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Slow Cooker Moroccan Stuffed Capsicums Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large red capsicums, halved and cored
150g couscous, red and green, cored and diced
1.2 cup vegetable stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced and drizzle the capsicums with oil on a baking sheet. Roast for 20 minutes.
Place the couscous in a bowl and pour over the stock. Cover and leave to absorb for 5 minutes. Fluff up with a fork and stir in the harissa, mixing well. Add chickpeas, feta and green olives.
Fill the capsicum halves with couscous filling and place in the slow cooker. Cover and cook on high for 3 hours. Sprinkle with pomegranate seeds and serve.
